properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for signing JWT tokens. Must be at least 32 characters long for HS256 algorithm.

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: Access token expiration time in milliseconds. Default is 86400000 (24 hours).

properties.name: jwt.refresh-expiration
properties.description: Refresh token expiration time in milliseconds. Default is 604800000 (7 days).
